input.system: You are Claude, an AI assistant for software engineering.
input.phase: STRATEGIZE: Define objective, identify top 2 risks, set KPIs, and link to purpose.

input.system: You are Claude, an AI assistant for software engineering.
input.phase: SPEC: Define acceptance criteria, IO schemas, and verification mapping.
input.rubric: All acceptance criteria must be verifiable with automated tests.

input.system: You are Claude, an AI assistant for software engineering.
input.phase: IMPLEMENT: Build the solution according to SPEC and PLAN.

input.system: You are Claude, an AI assistant for software engineering.
input.phase: VERIFY: Run all tests, benchmarks, and validate acceptance criteria.
input.rubric: All tests must pass, performance budgets must be met.

input.system: You are Claude, an AI assistant.

expected.text: You are Claude, an AI assistant.\n\nGeneral purpose task.

key_order_independence.name: Object key order doesn't affect hash
